item.title: 加拿大工会称，如果达不成协议，铁路罢工可能于 8 月 22 日开始
item.description: 加拿大卡车司机工会（Canadian Teamsters union）正在与该国最大的两家铁路公司谈判合同，该工会周五表示，如果达不成协议，可能会在 8 月 22 日开始停工。【原文：The Canadian Teamsters union, which is negotiating a contract with the country's two largest rail companies, said on Friday a work stoppage could start on Aug. 22 if a deal is not reached.】

item.title: Stellantis将解雇多达2450名工厂工人，因为经典公羊的生产将结束
item.description: 克莱斯勒母公司斯泰兰特将在底特律郊外的沃伦卡车装配厂裁员多达 2450 人，因为该汽车制造商将结束公羊 1500 经典卡车的生产。【原文：Chrysler-parent Stellantis is laying off as many as 2,450 factory workers from its Warren Truck assembly plant outside of Detroit as the automaker ends production of the Ram 1500 Classic truck.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司为今年可能的额外红利敞开大门
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）首席财务官费尔南多-梅尔加雷霍（Fernando Melgarejo）周五表示，如果有 "机会"，巴西国家石油公司将支付超常红利。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras will pay extraordinary dividends if there is an "opportunity" for it, Chief Financial Officer Fernando Melgarejo said on Friday.】

item.title: 欧盟高管坚信中国电动车措施符合世贸组织规定，称调查仍在继续
item.description: 欧盟执行机构周五表示，欧盟委员会相信其对中国电动汽车国家补贴的调查和措施符合世界贸易组织的规则，调查将继续进行。【原文：The European Commission is confident its investigation into, and measures against, state subsidies for Chinese electric vehicles are compatible with World Trade Organization rules and its probe will continue, the EU executive arm said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，思科将在今年第二次裁员中再裁员数千人
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，随着美国网络设备制造商将重点转向包括网络安全和人工智能在内的高增长领域，思科将在今年的第二轮裁员中裁减数千个职位。【原文：Cisco will cut thousands of jobs in a second round of layoffs this year as the U.S. networking equipment maker shifts focus to higher-growth areas, including cybersecurity and AI, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国投资者因担心经济放缓抢购货币市场基金
item.description: 在截至8月7日的一周里，美国投资者大量转向货币市场基金，在对经济放缓的担忧助长股市抛售的情况下，从风险较高的资产中撤出。【原文：U.S. investors shifted heavily into money market funds in the week ending Aug. 7, retreating from riskier assets during a stock market sell-off fueled by fears over an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 卡车需求强劲，尼古拉亏损低于预期
item.description: 尼古拉周五公布的第二季度营收超出华尔街预期，调整后亏损也小于预期，这表明随着客户增加支出，其氢气大型钻机的交付量也在上升。 这家电动卡车制造商的股票在早盘交易中上涨了 17%。【原文：Nikola beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue and posted a smaller-than-expected adjusted loss on Friday, signaling an uptick in deliveries of its hydrogen big rigs as clients ramped up spending. Shares of the electric truck maker rose 17% in early trading.】

item.title: 全球投资者在市场波动中涌入货币市场基金
item.description: 截至8月7日的七天里，全球投资者将大量资金注入货币市场基金，因为他们急于寻求安全，而市场波动性的激增是由对美国经济放缓和日元升值的担忧引发的，这促使套息交易平仓。【原文：Global investors funnelled substantial amounts into money market funds in the seven days to Aug. 7 as they rushed for safety amid a surge in market volatility triggered by fears of a U.S. slowdown and a strengthening yen that prompted unwinding of carry trades.】

item.title: 亚洲现货液化天然气价格维持在 7 个月高位，俄罗斯供应令人担忧
item.description: 亚洲液化天然气（LNG）现货价格保持在七个多月以来的最高水平，在市场担忧供应中断的情况下追随欧洲涨势。【原文：Asian spot liquefied natural gas (LNG) prices remained at their highest level in over seven months, tracking European gains amid concerns over supply disruption.】

item.title: 美国汽车监管机构就安全带问题对超过 33 万辆现代 SUV 展开调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周五表示，正在对美国约 332,288 辆现代 SUV 的安全带故障展开初步评估。【原文：U.S. auto safety regulators said on Friday that it was opening a preliminary evaluation into approximately 332,288 Hyundai SUVs in the United States over a potentially faulty seat belt.】

item.title: 中国恒大清算人要求投资者加入重组进程
item.description: 负债累累的房地产开发商中国恒大的清算人周五表示，恒大愿意听取有意重组该公司或其部分业务的投资者的意见。【原文：Liquidators of heavily indebted property developer China Evergrande said on Friday it is open to hearing from investors interested in restructuring the company or its parts.】

item.title: 消息人士称，泰勒-斯威夫特取消航班对保险公司造成打击
item.description: 一位知情人士说，斯威夫特很少取消演唱会，因此很受保险公司欢迎。【原文：Swift is popular among insurers as she rarely cancels concerts, a source said.】

item.title: 派拉蒙业绩大涨，流媒体业务稳步增长，电视部门减记也黯然失色
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司周五盘前股价大涨 6%，原因是投资者对该媒体集团流媒体业务的强劲增长欢呼雀跃，尽管该公司与竞争对手华纳兄弟发现公司（Warner Bros Discovery）一起减记了其电视资产的价值。【原文：Paramount Global's shares jumped 6% premarket on Friday as investors cheered strong growth at the media group's streaming business, even as the company joined rival Warner Bros Discovery in writing down the value of its TV assets.】

item.title: Expedia股价大涨，因对利润超预期的乐观情绪压倒了需求预警
item.description: 周五，Expedia 股价在盘前交易中跳涨超过 10%，市场对这家在线旅行社超过季度利润预期感到高兴，尽管该公司与其他旅游公司一样警告称未来需求将更加疲软。【原文：Shares of Expedia jumped more than 10% in premarket trading on Friday as markets cheered the online travel agency beating quarterly profit estimates, even as it joined other travel companies in warning of softer demand ahead.】

item.title: 百瑞戈召回16500罐婴儿配方奶粉
item.description: 周五提交的一份监管文件显示，Perrigo 已开始主动召回在 H-E-B Grocery Company 和 CVS 出售的一个批次中的三个批次，即 16,500 罐婴儿配方奶粉。【原文：Perrigo has initiated a voluntary recall of three lots within one batch, or 16,500 cans, of its infant formula sold at H-E-B Grocery Company and CVS , a regulatory filing showed on Friday.】

item.title: 散户投资者在过山车行情中仍是美国股票的买家--研究报告
item.description: 各种研究报告显示，在近期美国股市过山车行情的大部分时间里，散户投资者利用热门科技股大幅下跌的机会成为买家，不过他们也表现出谨慎的迹象。【原文：Retail investors were buyers during much of the recent rollercoaster in U.S. stock markets, taking advantage of a sharp fall in popular tech shares, according to various research reports, although they also showed signs of caution.】

item.title: 迪士尼携两部票房大作参加 D23 影迷大会
item.description: 凭借皮克斯动画片《反斗奇兵 2》（Inside Out 2）和漫威电影《死侍与金刚狼》（Deadpool & Wolverine）夺得暑期档票房冠军的华特迪士尼公司，将在周五举行的 D23 影迷大会上公布未来电影的详细信息。【原文：Walt Disney , which reclaimed the top of the summer box office with Pixar animation's Inside Out 2 and Marvel's raunchy Deadpool & Wolverine, is set to announce details of coming films at its D23 fan convention on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 美国股市过山车式的一周让投资者为未来的颠簸做好准备
item.description: 经过一周的市场剧烈波动，投资者开始关注通胀数据、企业盈利和总统大选民调，以寻找可以舒缓近期美股动荡的信号。【原文：A week of wild market swings has investors looking ahead to inflation data, corporate earnings and presidential polls for signals that could soothe a recent outbreak of turbulence in U.S. stocks.】

item.title: 美国 就业恐慌消退，市场趋于平静
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 就业数据公布后，美联储发表鸽派言论，期货上涨
item.description: 周五，与华尔街主要股指挂钩的期货价格攀升，原因是美联储官员发出的鸽派信号以及显示劳动力市场仍有活力的数据进一步提振了市场情绪。【原文：Futures tied to Wall Street's main indexes climbed on Friday, as dovish signals from Federal Reserve officials and data showing a still-resilient labor market further boosted sentiment.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，印度马恒达寻求批准在陕西成立 30 亿美元的合资企业
item.description: 消息人士告诉路透社，印度汽车制造商马恒达（Mahindra & Mahindra）和中国陕汽集团已同意成立一家价值 30 亿美元的合资企业，在印度建设一家汽车制造厂，目前正在等待新德里的批准。【原文：Indian automaker Mahindra & Mahindra and China's Shaanxi Automobile Group have agreed to set up a $3 billion joint venture to build a car manufacturing plant in India and are awaiting New Delhi's approval, sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国 7 月银行贷款将下降，中国政府将继续关注政策支持
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，尽管中国央行加大了对经济的政策支持力度，但受信贷需求不振和季节性因素的拖累，中国7月份新增人民币贷款可能环比大幅下降。【原文：China's new yuan loans likely fell sharply in July from the previous month, a Reuters poll showed on Friday, dragged down by tepid credit demand and seasonal factors even as the central bank steps up policy support for the economy.】

item.title: 德国工会与汉莎航空发现者航空公司达成工资协议
item.description: 德国工会威尔第（Verdi）周五表示，它已与汉莎航空旗下的发现航空公司（Discover Airlines）达成工资协议，驾驶舱和客舱乘务员的工资最高将增加 38%。【原文：German union Verdi said on Friday it has reached a wage agreement with Lufthansa's Discover Airlines that will increase the salaries of cockpit and cabin crew by up to 38%.】

item.title: 随着国内航空公司向海外扩张，外国航空公司对中国失去兴趣
item.description: 行业数据显示，由于中国旅游需求疲软、成本上升以及需要避开俄罗斯领空导致飞行时间延长，外国竞争对手望而却步，中国航空公司在国际航线上的市场份额不断扩大。【原文：Chinese airlines are gaining market share on international routes, industry data shows, as foreign rivals are deterred by weak China travel demand and rising costs and extended flight times because of the need to avoid Russian airspace.】

item.title: 市场可能在招手，而不是溺水：迈克-多兰
item.description: 看似混乱的金融市场可能只是正常化，最终将有助于保护投资组合，而不是将其置于死地。【原文：What looks like a financial market in disarray may instead just be normalization that will ultimately help insulate investment portfolios rather than sending them to the ground.】

item.title: 美国零售商担心罢工和干扰，抢购节假日进口商品
item.description: 零售商正在推动今年夏天的美国进口热潮，因为各公司都在防范可能发生的港口工人罢工，以及在假日购物季缩短之前红海袭击事件造成的持续航运中断。【原文：Retailers are fueling a summer rush of imports to the United States this year, as companies guard against a potential port workers strike and ongoing shipping disruptions from attacks in the Red Sea ahead of a shortened holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 全球石油需求需要更快增长才能消化欧佩克+的涨幅
item.description: 据数据、分析师和业内人士称，未来几个月全球石油需求增长需要加快，否则市场将难以消化欧佩克+计划从 10 月份开始增加的石油供应。【原文：Global oil demand growth needs to accelerate in coming months or the market will struggle to absorb an increase in oil supply that OPEC+ is planning to make from October, according to data, analysts and industry sources.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国要求部分券商对债券交易进行合规性检查
item.description: 三位知情人士称，中国证券监管机构已下令一些券商检查其债券交易活动，因为当局正试图控制对中国政府债券的疯狂购买。【原文：China's securities regulator has ordered some brokerages to inspect their bond trading activities, three people with knowledge of the matter said, as authorities seek to rein in frenzied buying of Chinese government bonds.】

item.title: 衰退风险扰动市场，但尚不令人担忧
item.description: 令人失望的美国就业数据动摇了人们对全球最大经济体软着陆的信心，导致全球股市暴跌，降息押注激增。【原文：Disappointing U.S. jobs data has shaken confidence in a soft landing for the world's largest economy, sending global equity markets tumbling and bets on interest rate cuts surging.】

item.title: 早间竞标动荡的一周在高潮中结束
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu.】
